quote_first: He looked at his front-line clock on the bedside table and noted that it had stopped at
quote_last: . So, you couldn’t even rely on alarm clocks.
quote_raw: He looked at his front-line clock on the bedside table and noted that it had stopped at 3.04. So, you couldn’t even rely on alarm clocks.
title: The Return of the Dancing Master
author: Henning Mankell
